title: Free Cap with the purchase of my SGC 60 Bridwell
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Free Cap with the purchase of my SGC 60 Bridwell
posts.post_content:
This Bridwell with Cap version has primarily a L-R centering issue.

The Sweet Cap Factory 42 overstrike back also reveals about one half of the Factory 30 which was not overstruck.  

I do not need your cap size for the cap in the title refers to the one Mr. Bridwell is wearing. ;)

$95 shipped for this factory and a half anomaly:eek:.  Add $3 for regular PP.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/18395/bridwell-with-cap[/IMG]
You seem to always get me :(
